headline: Starbucks (SBUX) Is Down 9.2% After $1 Billion Restructuring and Major Store Closures - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In late September 2025, Starbucks announced a US$1 billion restructuring plan that includes closing hundreds of stores across North America and reducing approximately 900 corporate positions, following similar cuts made earlier this year. This shift represents a major departure from Starbucks' previous expansion-focused approach, raising questions about how the company will balance operational efficiency with growth in a challenging competitive landscape. We'll examine the effects of these...
